channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 富时 100 指数的一位老板说，他公司的股价是 "垃圾"。在英国股票中，它远非唯一的弱者。与 @irinaanghel12 一同阅读
item.description:
A FTSE 100 boss says his firm's share price is "crap." It's far from being the only underdog among UK stocks. Get The Readout with @irinaanghel12 https://t.co/50azC7d2kM

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 在农民的抗议下，法国暂停进口用杀虫剂噻虫啉处理过的新鲜水果和蔬菜
item.description:
France suspended the import of fresh fruits and vegetables treated with the insecticide thiacloprid following protests by farmers https://t.co/Mvq5McCDRF

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 法国财政部长布鲁诺-勒梅尔（Bruno Le Maire）抨击欧盟在支持资本市场方面进展缓慢，这加剧了官员们对一个对避免经济长期疲软至关重要的项目的紧张情绪。
item.description:
French Finance Minister Bruno Le Maire slammed the EU for making only sluggish progress in bolstering capital markets, raising tensions over a project officials say is crucial to avoid prolonged economic weakness https://t.co/4D0r5VBgfl

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 安联集团首席执行官 Baete 表示，随着一些陷入困境的业主被迫出售房产，现在正是低价抢购房产的好时机
item.description:
Now is the right moment to snap up properties at bargain prices as some troubled owners are forced into selling, Allianz CEO Baete says https://t.co/1sSgrJsNdv

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 克罗地亚政府呼吁举行更多会谈，以解决美国支持的天然气管道争端
item.description:
Croatia’s government called for more talks to resolve a dispute over a US-backed natural gas pipeline https://t.co/ui4XlDTubK

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 曼联的新任亿万富翁吉姆-拉特克利夫表示，他不会简单地拿出支票簿来解决俱乐部的问题。
item.description:
Manchester United's new billionaire owner Jim Ratcliffe says he won't simply get his checkbook out to solve the club's problems

"That's proven many, many times not to end well," he adds https://t.co/eHoqkt6MFR pic.twitter.com/fMPUbAt3UB

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 周五，阿拉伯联合酋长国从全球监督机构的 "灰名单 "中除名，这距离海湾国家被降级还不到两年时间，为当地政府打击非法资金流动的努力画上了圆满的句号。
item.description:
The United Arab Emirates was removed from a global watchdog’s “gray list” on Friday, less than two years after the Gulf state’s demotion, capping a push by local authorities to clamp down on illicit financial flows https://t.co/MH6ksXRXUx

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）领导的政府正在与国内、乌克兰和印度投资者进行初步谈判，以寻求拯救意大利最大的钢铁制造商。
item.description:
Giorgia Meloni’s government is in preliminary talks with domestic, Ukrainian and Indian investors for a potential bid to rescue Italy’s biggest steelmaker https://t.co/TvOmarF9YN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 全球最大的钢铁制造商安赛乐米塔尔本周进一步减持了土耳其 Erdemir 公司的股份，目前仅持有该公司 2% 的股份。
item.description:
ArcelorMittal, the world’s biggest steelmaker, has further reduced its stake in Turkey’s Erdemir this week, leaving it with just 2% of the company https://t.co/TKHFedwdvn

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 安德烈斯-曼努埃尔-洛佩斯-奥夫拉多尔（Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador）表示，他并不后悔与《纽约时报》记者共享电话号码，该记者曾就美国卡特尔初步调查报告提出过问题。
item.description:
Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador says he doesn’t regret sharing the phone number of a New York Times reporter who submitted questions about a report of an initial US cartel probe https://t.co/0QzKvuoKkh

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 厄瓜多尔总统告诉美国有线电视新闻网（CNN），在得知数十年之久的俄罗斯武器将被运往乌克兰后，他取消了与美国交换这些武器的计划
item.description:
Ecuador’s president tells CNN he canceled plans to swap decades-old Russian weapons with the US after learning they would be delivered to Ukraine https://t.co/aql912u8bP

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 一个为政府提供建议的小组称，英国移民工人规则的改变会 "增加 "护理人员 "遭受剥削的风险"。
item.description:
Changes to the UK’s migrant worker rules pose “an increased risk of exploitation” for care workers, according to a panel that advises the government https://t.co/nGXgKCYLCw

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 周五，Booking Holdings 的股价创下 20 个月来最大跌幅，此前该公司对旅游预订量的预测令人失望。
item.description:
Booking Holdings shares fell the most in 20 months on Friday after giving a disappointing forecast for travel reservations https://t.co/10sVfg172a

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 由于在打击非法资金流动方面存在不足，肯尼亚再次被列入全球金融监督机构的 "灰名单
item.description:
Kenya has again been placed on a global financial watchdog’s “gray list” due to its shortcomings in tackling illicit financial flows https://t.co/6yOJ5yREyX

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马里奥-森特诺（Mario Centeno）表示，如果数据显示需要降低借贷成本，欧洲中央银行必须做好准备，考虑在下个月降低借贷成本，即使这只是一个低概率事件。
item.description:
The European Central Bank must be ready to consider lowering borrowing costs next month if data call for it, even if that’s only a low-probability event, according to Governing Council member Mario Centeno https://t.co/MPNEkBSX7j

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 穆罕默德-埃尔-埃里安担心，美联储开始削减开支的时间可能会等得太久
item.description:
Mohamed El-Erian is concerned that the Fed may wait too long to start cutting https://t.co/p00tf3ddNc

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 认识泰勒梅背后的投资者，他希望继续收购高尔夫球
item.description:
Meet the investor behind TaylorMade who wants to keep on buying up golf https://t.co/7NJMj7YBV4

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 谁在为谁的竞选活动捐款？拜登总统在筹款战中获胜，但在蓝领工人的支持率方面落后于特朗普
item.description:
Who’s contributing to whose campaign? President Biden is winning the fundraising battle but lags Trump in support from workers in blue-collar jobs https://t.co/9Bu2lSg5Oe pic.twitter.com/5DnXQexo3K

— Bloomberg Graphics (@BBGVisualData) February 23, 2024

item.title: 法国保险经纪公司四月集团正在向传统贷款机构申请一笔 12 亿欧元的银团贷款，以帮助其为一年多前从私人债权人处获得的债务进行再融资。
item.description:
French insurance broker April Group is turning to traditional lenders for a €1.2 billion syndicated loan to help refinance debt that it took out from private creditors just over a year ago https://t.co/nrQrJdRKTZ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 德国立法者批准了一项有争议的法案，将个人使用大麻合法化，为从 4 月 1 日起控制大麻消费铺平了道路。
item.description:
German lawmakers have approved a controversial bill legalizing personal use of cannabis, paving the way for controlled consumption of the drug from April 1 https://t.co/LOYswfqmhy

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 亿万富翁比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）对《商业内幕》（Business Insider）的攻势升级，称如果该网站不更正或撤回指控其妻子剽窃的报道，就可能面临诉讼。
item.description:
Billionaire Bill Ackman escalated his offensive against Business Insider, saying it could face a lawsuit if it doesn’t correct or retract stories alleging his wife committed plagiarism https://t.co/t3GJwUWpHf

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 美国财政部一位高级官员表示，美国正在探索使用在入侵乌克兰事件爆发时被冻结的 3,000 亿美元俄罗斯国有资产的方案，以帮助支付这个饱受战争蹂躏的国家的重建费用。
item.description:
The US is exploring options to use $300 billion in Russian state assets frozen at the outbreak of its Ukraine invasion to help pay for the war-torn country’s reconstruction, a top US Treasury official said. https://t.co/FHsoTasqSn

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 本周五，3M 医疗保健部门 Solventum 将进入美国投资级市场，在本周 530 亿美元闪电借款的基础上，公司将利用投资者的强劲需求。
item.description:
3M healthcare unit Solventum is tapping the US investment-grade market Friday, building on a $53 billion borrowing blitz this week as companies capitalize on robust investor demand. https://t.co/pkt729tlsc

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 博鳌亚洲论坛认为人工智能和经济增长是股市上涨的 "法宝
item.description:
BofA Sees AI, Economic Growth as ‘Magic Sauce’ for Stock Gains https://t.co/QwzOPo3MIW

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 经济学家再次下调了美国经济衰退的预期，因为人们预期就业市场的增长和消费者支出的增加将支撑今年经济的强劲增长
item.description:
Economists again marked down US recession forecasts on expectations that a growing job market and bump in consumer spending will support stronger economic growth this year https://t.co/mypTmLPWqf

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 如果你想年薪达到或超过 20 万美元，那就准备好脱下你的工作服吧：高薪职位的远程工作列表正在大幅减少
item.description:
If you want to make $200,000 or more a year, prepare to dust off your work clothes: Remote work listings for high-wage jobs are dropping dramatically https://t.co/JmpBYHadIv

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: Fortress 公司联席首席执行官约书亚-帕克（Joshua Pack）表示，随着商业地产崩盘开始影响贷款人的资产负债表，将有更多的美国银行倒闭。
item.description:
More US banks will fail as the commercial real estate crash begins to work its way through to lenders’ balance sheets, according to Joshua Pack, co-chief executive officer at Fortress https://t.co/G7SOpsL7M1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 迈阿密海滩一座拥有丽思卡尔顿设施的新公寓大楼的顶层阁楼预计售价为 1.25 亿美元，与纽约市一些最奢华的建筑相媲美。
item.description:
A sprawling penthouse at a new Miami Beach condo tower with Ritz-Carlton amenities is expected to be marketed at $125 million, putting it on par with some of New York City’s ritziest buildings https://t.co/EWStMQOvaN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，欧洲中央银行最好逐步放宽货币政策
item.description:
The European Central Bank may be better off easing monetary policy gradually, says Governing Council member Joachim Nagel https://t.co/mg6JOnWSw5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024

item.title: 特拉菲古拉（Trafigura）交易员特里斯坦-阿尔马达（Tristan Almada）正在建立自己的独立大宗商品对冲基金，这在大宗商品多头市场中实属罕见。
item.description:
Trafigura trader Tristan Almada is setting up his own independent commodity hedge fund, a rare move in a world of big multi-strats https://t.co/7kHQm8D3Fw

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 23, 2024
